about.title: About Us | Uncle Potato
about.description: Learn about Uncle Potato (Oncle Patate), Montreal's favorite 100% HALAL fast food restaurant serving fresh burgers, baked potatoes, and more from two locations.
about.heading: About Us
about.subtitle: Montreal's Favorite Halal Fast Food
about.para1: Welcome to Uncle Potato — where every bite is crafted with care, every ingredient is 100% HALAL certified, and every visit feels like family. Born in the heart of Montreal, we set out to prove that fast food could be both delicious and made with integrity.
about.para2: From our signature juicy burgers and perfectly baked potatoes to our crispy chicken tenders, refreshing smoothies, and golden fries, every item on our menu is made fresh using quality ingredients. We take pride in serving the Montreal community from our two locations in Chabanel and Côte-des-Neiges.
about.para3: As a proudly HALAL-certified restaurant, we believe everyone deserves access to food that tastes great and meets their values. Come visit us — we can't wait to serve you.
